title: 4 Chrome Extensions to Download Videos on Instagram

steps.title: Download Reels, Stories, posts, pictures, and videos!
steps.content: Download Reels, Stories, posts, pictures, and videos! Go to the Chrome Web Store to download and install it. Once you have the extension up and running, you can click the download icon to download the video, Story, or Reel, you're currently viewing!

steps.title: This is a lightweight addon for Instagram.
steps.content: This is a lightweight addon for Instagram. You can grab it from the Chrome Web Store . Once you have the addon installed and enabled , you'll see the download icon (downwards pointing arrow) in the top left corner of any video on Instagram that you watch in Chrome. Videos will be downloaded to the default download folder in Chrome, which is usually the "Downloads" folder.

steps.title: This extension imitates the mobile Instagram app in your browser.
steps.content: This extension imitates the mobile Instagram app in your browser. It says that you can download Stories, video posts, or videos in IGTV! Get it at the Chrome Web Store .

steps.title: Although it's not currently working, it may be updated soon.
steps.content: Although it's not currently working, it may be updated soon. If you want to add IG Downloader to a "Might work eventually" list, go to the Chrome Web Store and download/install the extension.
